item.title: Trump says progress made in Ukraine talks but 'thorny issues' remain
item.description: Both the US president and Zelensky describe talks in Florida as "great" and "terrific" but the issue of territory remains "unresolved".

item.title: John Simpson: 'I've reported on 40 wars but I've never seen a year like 2025'
item.description: It has been a year of multiple major conflicts - and there are geopolitical implications of unparalleled importance

item.title: James Bond game 007 First Light delayed to May 2026
item.description: Dexter Original Sin actor Patrick Gibson will star as the British spy when the game releases on 27 May.

item.title: Pothole claims up 90% in three years, says RAC
item.description: Research from the motoring group also finds that only one in four claims results in a payout.

item.title: Man shot dead by police after two-car crash
item.description: Officers say the suspect is reported to have left the scene holding a handgun.
